tag_list: mna, developmnet, nonprofit, consultant, npo, management
overview:
Ms. Linda M. Micciche, MNA, is the Director of Development and e-Communications for the Sisters of the Holy Family.

Having worked in Fund Development and Nonprofit Organization Management since 1989, she has experience in the following NPO sub-sectors: environmental, peace and social justice, professional associations, children and women – in addition to religion.

Active member of the Association of Fundraising Professionals (AFP) and National Catholic Development Conference (NCDC).

Undergraduate Bachelor of Science, University of Massachusetts, Boston, MA. College of Management Mktg, 1988.

Masters in Nonprofit Administration, University of San Francisco, CA. College of Professional Studies, Institute of Nonprofit Organization Management, 2000.

Development Director Certificate: USF, 1997
